hero.title: Seamless Flow:
hero.subtitle: Enterprise Service & API Development
hero.desc1: Eliminate data silos between your business systems. We develop secure, scalable RESTful/SOAP APIs for all your enterprise software, including Logo ERP.
hero.highlight: Push the Limits of Automation and Data Integration.

features.title: 3 Key Principles in Our Service Development Approach

cards.title: Logo ERP Expertise
cards.desc: We write custom integration services ensuring data consistency and security, knowing the Logo product family structure in depth.

cards.title: Security and Performance Focus
cards.desc: All our APIs are protected with OAuth/JWT authorization standards, guaranteeing minimal latency in high-volume transactions.

cards.title: Documentation and Management
cards.desc: We document each API according to Swagger/OpenAPI standards, ensuring easy management and sustainability.

cards.title: E-Commerce & Marketplace Integrations

cards.title: Financial & Banking Services
items: Automatic posting of bank account transactions to ERP accounting.
Integration with credit card collection systems and payment gateways.

cards.title: E-Transformation Services
items: Generating and sending e-invoice / e-archive from custom software.
Two-way data communication with reconciliation platforms.

cards.title: CRM & Help Desk Systems
items: Automatic creation of customer accounts from CRM to ERP.
Linking support tickets with ERP service forms.

technology.title: Infrastructure & Technology Assurance
